overview: The kind and rustic rural girl, Maisui, had to drop out of school due to her father’s unintentional fall. The unaccompanied Mai Sui found the son of a worker who worked in Wensheng’s shop in the city. Dan Qing of Chinese folk art, and then Dan Qing often went to the professor to paint, but because of the misunderstanding of the son of Danqing and wheat. Mai Sui moved Zhang Zong because of her obsession, hanging her work.  Danqing found the wheat ear and hoped that she would participate in the French promotion of Chinese peasant painting, but Mai Sui refused.
title: Wheats of Hope
